name: Enough Software
tag_list: j2me, mobile, mobile-development, iphone, android, bada, web-os, apps, mobile-java, application-development, j2me-polish, porting, mobile-advertising
overview: Enough Software offers J2ME Polish, an open source framework for mobile Java development. J2ME Polish helps porting applications, makes it easy to apply different designs to one application without changing the source code and adjusts your application to hundreds of handsets automatically. Furthermore, Enough Software develops mobile applications for all platforms and any purpose. Companies like Huawei, Vodafone, Qualcomm, Nokia, Jamba or Samsung are using Enough Software’s products and services today.
